attributes.action: Close down some of the Bookmakers and Armusment Arcades in Bradford City Center
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are why to meny Bookmakers and Armusment Arcades in Bradford City Center at the moment.
There is nowhere really to shop because of them and also it is making a lot of peoples lifes hard because there have problems with gambling. 
The amount of Bookmakers and Armusment Arcades is getting out of hand and a new Betfred Bookmakers has just been opened in the city center a few weeks ago. 
At the moment there are 6 Bookmakers and 7 Armusment Arcades in the city.
Why do we need so meny of them?
The answer is that we dont need them at all!!!
Get some of them closed not all just some because we dont need so meny!!!
